attributes.action: To Ban smoking in the Houses of Parliment and all other goverment buildings as MPs should lead by example
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment smoking is not banned in the houses of Parliment Bars . I am a smoker and don't feel MPs are entitled to flaunt the law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
